briefdescription.para: Pointer to the currently active console.
Initialise framebuffer backbuffer from Limine response.

detaileddescription.para: Allocates a backbuffer equal in size to the primary framebuffer. Must be called before drawing or flipping.

briefdescription.para: Get the base address of the backbuffer.

simplesect.para: 64-bit physical address of the framebuffer backbuffer.

briefdescription.para: Calculate pixel offset in framebuffer from coordinates.

simplesect.para: Byte offset into framebuffer; 0 if out of bounds.

briefdescription.para: Get the console width in text cells (columns).
Get the console height in text cells (rows).
Query the current cursor position.

detaileddescription.para: Issues an ANSI position request to the terminal backend. Blocks until a response is received.

briefdescription.para: Move the cursor to a specific (x,y) cell.
Draw a pixel to the backbuffer.
Read a pixel from the backbuffer.

simplesect.para: 32-bit RGB value at the given position.

briefdescription.para: Clear the screen and reset cursor to (0,0).
Write a single character directly to the debug port (0xE9).
Write a single character to the console.

detaileddescription.para: Cursor is advanced after output, and the screen may scroll.

briefdescription.para: Write a string to the debug port (0xE9) only.
Write a null-terminated string to the console.

detaileddescription.para: Text begins at the current cursor location. Cursor is updated afterwards, and scrolling occurs if needed.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct flanterm_context *ctx, uint64_t type, uint64_t x, uint64_t y, uint64_t z)
memberdef.name: terminal_callback

briefdescription.para: Initialise the primary console and framebuffer.

detaileddescription.para: Called during kernel startup. Detects the framebuffer via Limine, initialises Flanterm, loads a font module (if present), and prepares the first console for output.

briefdescription.para: Get the framebuffer width in pixels.
Get the framebuffer height in pixels.
Set the background colour for subsequent text.
Set the foreground (text) colour for subsequent output.
Query whether auto-flip mode is enabled.

simplesect.para: true if auto-flip is active, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Enable or disable auto-flip mode.

parameterdescription.para: true to enable, false to disable.

briefdescription.para: Copy backbuffer to the frontbuffer if dirty.

detaileddescription.para: If auto-flip is enabled, this occurs automatically after writes. Otherwise, call rr_flip() manually to refresh the display.
